other objects.description: Several green garbage bins are placed on the right side of the road near a building.
other objects.explanation: The garbage bins are potential obstacles that the ego car needs to avoid to prevent a collision.

general_perception.description and explanation: The traffic image shows several green garbage bins placed on the right side of the road near a building. These garbage bins are potential obstacles that the ego car needs to avoid to prevent a collision.

1.description and explanation: This object is a dustbin typically used for collecting garbage. It is located near the roadside, which hints towards the need for vehicles to navigate cautiously to avoid any unintended collision. The presence of such objects along the road can indicate populated or residential areas, advising the driver to maintain lower speed limits and increased vigilance for pedestrians and other vehicles possibly obscured by the bin or emerging from the vicinity.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should drive slowly and cautiously to avoid the garbage bins on the right side of the road. Ensure that the car's headlights are on for better visibility in the dark. Since there are no other vehicles or vulnerable road users visible, the car can proceed with normal caution for nighttime driving.
